<script>
  // Check if the user came from the specific URL with `utm_source=kwikengage`
  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  if (urlParams.get('utm_source') === 'kwikengage') {
    // Store this in sessionStorage to track the user
    sessionStorage.setItem('cameFromKwikengage', 'true');
  }
</script>
